content:
Physical Education    

The College is equipped with a large playground with facilities to play cricket, volleyball, basketball, ball badminton, tennis, Kabaddi, Kho-Kho, Football and etc., and also a well laid out standard 400 meter track. Provision for playing indoor games like table tennis, carom, Chess is also made. Intramural matches are conducted to encourage and sharpen the skills of the students.

   Our college has won many intercollegiate matches in several events and especially Cricket, Kho-Kho, Chess, ball badminton team has brought in several laurels. The infrastructure available is also utilised for conducting Zonal/University / District level matches. As an extension activity, the Physical Education Department conducts Yoga classes and practice for the benefit of students. Gymnasium facilities are introduced for the welfare of the students.
